#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(

              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_R_Task_Action_SYNCEDRECORD.taskActionId]

    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_R_Task_Action_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_R_Task_Action_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime]),
        "–",
        datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_R_Task_Action_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(

      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_R_Task_Action_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy], "–")
